General.Name: EL.En. S.p.A
General.Description: EL.En. S.p.A. engages in the research and development, planning, manufacture, and sale of laser systems in Italy, rest of Europe, and internationally. The company offers medical laser equipment for use in the fields of physiotherapy, orthopedics, traumatology, rheumatology, dermatology, sports and rehabilitative medicines, surgery, aesthetics, and art; EchoLaser, an integrated laser-ultrasound system that allows diagnosis and treatment of benign and malignant lesions; hair removal and non-invasive body contouring products; and laser sources and systems for cutting, welding, marking, and engraving on countless materials. It also develops laser systems that helps professional of restoration bring back masterpieces to their original condition; and provides after-sales services, such as supplying of spare parts, as well as consulting and technical assistance services. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Calenzano, Italy.

3.Name: Dr. Enrico  Romagnoli
3.Title: Investor Relations Mang., Mang. of the Financial Department & Exec. Officer
